title: The Road from Roxbury
description: With the end of the War of 1812, life for seven-year-old Charlotte is changing for the better when her father decides to take the family to Boston to see some of the sights and an animal called an elephant, yet despite the excitement of the city, there isWith the end of the War of 1812, life for seven-year-old Charlotte is changing for the better when her father decides to take the family to Boston to see some of the sights and an animal called an elephant, yet despite the excitement of the city, there is still one thing she loves more in Roxbury. Simultaneous. still one thing she loves more in Roxbury. Simultaneous.
author: Melissa Wiley
